entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then to 70 gusting to 90. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
